captions.text: How do I build a house?
You need to get building materials
Hey what happened to your voice?
Oh I’m just a voice inside your head I can change when ever I want
Oh really? Jason fall of the pig
No I’m not going to fa-
Ok so maybe you’re in my head
It’s also night time and your surround by hostile Mobs
